front.title: Experience with the LOADng routing protocol for LLNs

abstract.t: This document reports experience with the LOADng routing protocol for LLNs which is specified in the draft-clausen-lln-loadng internet draft. This report is providing information resulting from interoperability testing performed at Hitachi YRL facilities in Yokohama, Japan, from october 17th to october 19th 2011.
